channel.title: Articles on log
channel.description: Recent content in Articles on log

item.title: Welcome
item.description: Welcome to my log. Here I’ll be posting many links to sites with a record of my thoughts and comments on such articles, with occasional long form articles (which I predict I will never actually get around to). In a way, this is just a tumblr replacement. However, I think there was merit in learning how to set up a microblog with Hugo, so this was absolutely not a waste of time.
